title: Monitoring and Metrics
body_html:
Monitoring and Metrics

Endpoints

  • /api/health – liveness & readiness (includes webhook checks)
  • /metrics – Prometheus metrics

Metrics (examples)

  • Counter webhook_deliveries_total{status,webhook_id}
  • Histogram webhook_delivery_duration_seconds
  • Gauge active_webhooks_total

Logging

  • Structured JSON with context (webhookId, eventId, url, status, duration)
  • Log redaction for secrets

Alerts

  • High failure rate
  • Long delivery latency
  • Queue backlog
